import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" const plans = [ { id: 1, name: 'Small', sleeveLength: '58cm', bust: '82cm', hips: '92cm', length: '85cm', isCurrent: false, }, { id: 2, name: 'Medium', sleeveLength: '59cm', bust: '86cm', hips: '96cm', length: '86cm', }, { id: 3, name: 'Large', sleeveLength: '60cm', bust: '90cm', hips: '100cm', length: '87cm', }, ] function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } export default function SizingTable({ name, handleChange }) { const [sizes, setSizes] = useState({ small: { sleeveLength: '', bust: '', hips: '', length: '', }, medium: { sleeveLength: '', bust: '', hips: '', length: '', }, large: { sleeveLength: '', bust: '', hips: '', length: '', }, }) useEffect(() => { handleChange({target: {name, value: sizes}}); }, [sizes]); return (
